item.title: The music industry is broken. OpenWav’s new app aims to change that
item.description: OpenWav is building a direct-to-fan platform for music artists which lets them keep more of the profits.

item.title: How China’s Propaganda and Surveillance Systems Really Operate
item.description: A series of corporate leaks show that Chinese technology companies function far more like their Western peers than one might imagine.

item.title: The 65 Best Movies on Disney+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Thunderbolts*, Sacramento, and Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.
